title: Fulfillment
description: The quantity that the economic event fulfilled towards the commitment.

fulfills.description: The commitment which is completely or partially fulfilled by an economic event.

fulfilledBy.description: The economic event which completely or partially fulfills a commitment.

fulfilledQuantity.description: The quantity of the fulfillment of an event towards a commitment.

under.description: Reference to an agreement between agents which specifies the rules or policies which govern this fulfillment.
